node.title: Prison Won’t Be a Riot for the QAnon Shaman, Jimmy Kimmel Says
node.alt: “Weird to think the QAnon Shaman could get four years in prison when the guy who encouraged him to do it could get four more years in the White House,” Jimmy Kimmel said.
node.description: “Prosecutors are recommending 51 months behind bars, after which, he will be remanded into the custody of ‘Dancing With the Stars,’” Kimmel joked.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "On Thursday night, Jimmy Kimmel joked that Jacob Chansley, \u201cthe infamous insurrectionist\u201d known as the QAnon Shaman who took part in the Capitol attack on Jan. 6, \u201cis probably not gonna be storming anything any time soon.\u201d", "This week, prosecutors suggested that Chansley be sentenced to more than four years in prison for his role in the incursion, which would be the most severe punishment yet for a participant.", "The \u201cDaily Show\u201d correspondent Desi Lydic put the spotlight on female veterans throughout \u201chist-HER-y.\u201d", "A new documentary about Julia Child explores her influence on how Americans cook and eat."]
